document.full_text: citing its broader inclusiveness, some experts said the group of 20 might be a better forum for discussing global financial issues than the western-dominated group of 8.
document.title: special report: g-8: as g-8 meets, asian leaders seek a bigger role
lines_and_colors: citing its broader inclusiveness, some experts said the group of 20 might be a better forum for discussing global financial issues than the western-dominated group of 8.
